listing.listing_description: Experience the famously warm Bali weather and hospitality at the gorgeous Villa Nehal. This Badung-area vacation rental is just a short drive from several great beaches, trendy restaurants and family-friendly attractions, but feels like a private oasis. Let the five bedrooms and attentive staff welcome you in a group of up to ten friends.During your holiday, a breakfast cook, housekeeper and gardener will see to your needs. Since the villa is set in a quieter area where rice fields still abound, it’s peaceful in the courtyard around the swimming pool and al-fresco lounging and dining areas. In the evenings, enjoy the TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. For your comfort and convenience, the villa has air conditioning and laundry facilities.Wall-to-wall glass doors, which can be folded away, are all that separates the outdoor living areas from the villa’s great room. A stone floor and wood-paneled vaulted ceiling add natural texture to the spacious sitting and dining areas, and a breakfast bar connects the great room to the stylish modern kitchen, which is fully equipped.There are three bedrooms in the main house of this luxury property and two in a guest house that offers honeymoon-style privacy to a couple or separate accommodations for teens. All five bedrooms have king beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and open to a balcony or terrace.Though it feels like a world away from the ordinary, Villa Nehal’s setting in Umalas Tegal Cupek puts you about a 5-minute drive from some of the most popular Seminyak beaches and hottest beach clubs, as well as must-try eateries and tempting boutiques. Splash around at the Waterbom Bali Waterslides in Kuta, a short drive away, or indulge yourself with a massage or treatment at one of several nearby spas.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Embrace your wild side at this breezy beachfront estate in Bali. Wander grounds decorated with mature palms, lush gardens, and scenic ocean lookouts. Stretch out in a sun lounger and work on your tan from the cantilevered-deck. Then, follow steps down to your own slice of sandy beach. Later, drive 3-minutes to Pererenan for dinner at one of the town’s beachfront restaurants. Balinese architecture makes a point of incorporating natural surroundings, which is exceptionally luxurious when the property is right on the beach. Wake up each morning to fragrant gardens and cool sea breeze. Sip your morning coffee amongst earthy, wood adorned interiors decorated with Balinese art and designer furnishings. And, dine beneath chandelier lights next to the fully equipped kitchen. After dinner, throw a movie on the projector screen for the kids and mix yourself a tropical cocktail to enjoy on the rooftop lounge. Refresh with a quick hop in the pool. When it cools off at night, do some stargazing from the hot tub. In the morning, start your day with a trip to the home gym and a few minutes in the sauna. For lunch, grill up something fresh on the barbecue. Start your Balinese exploration at Tanah Lot, the island’s most iconic temple. Built on an ancient rock formation in the sea, Tanah Lot’s crashing waves and sunset views make for incredible vacation pictures. Later that night, hit the beachfront party scene at Finn’s Recreation Club, home to several beach bars, oceanfront restaurants, and bustling night clubs. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located within the prestigious gated community of the Mauna Lani Resort on the Big Island, villa Lau’lea is the perfect home base for an incredible Hawaiian getaway. Overlooking the Francis H. L’i Brown Golf Course, with the ocean just beyond, you’ll have quick and easy access to the course and Mauna Lani Beach. With four king ensuite bedrooms and spacious indoor/outdoor lounge areas, Lau’lea is ideal for a golf trip with friends, family beach vacation, or sunny corporate retreat.Lau’lea’s property is decorated with lush greenery, mature palms, and rugged stonework, showing off the beautiful environment of the Big Island. Moving inside, you’ll appreciate elegant natural elements like marble floors, rich wood tones, and a breezy, open-air layout. When the multiple doors to the terrace are open, Lau’lea floods with warm tropical sunlight and fresh ocean breeze. In the living room, you’ll find high-end designer furnishings and electronics. The fully equipped kitchen is sure to inspire culinary creativity with its restaurant caliber stainless steel appliances. And, the formal and alfresco dining areas are sure to provide beautiful settings for any occasion.Outside, you’ll love spending afternoons cooling off in the infinity swimming pool, and nights relaxing in the hot tub. After a morning on the golf course, head back home for a quick barbeque lunch before heading out to explore the many amenities of the Mauna Lani Resort.When it’s time to hit the beach, Mauna Lani’s private beach club is just a nine-minute walk from Lau’lea, and there are several more gorgeous beaches in the area, many within six or seven miles. On the resort, you’ll find kayaking, snorkeling, scuba diving, and sailing tours available from Mauna Lani Sea Adventures. And, the nearby city of Waimea is perfect for shopping, dining, and nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Hill 4102 is a spectacular two-bedroom luxury villa, which is within walking distance of the Four Seasons Resort Hualalai, truly one of the world’s great resorts.Envelop yourself in the soothing sounds of the gentle waves on the shoreline as you relax and unwind in this exceptional ground floor Hill Villa. Push open the receding glass pocket doors and head out to your spacious lanai to make the most of Hawaii’s indoor/outdoor lifestyle. Hualalai truly is a premier destination and what sets this villa apart is its central location and refurbished style. The home has been recently extensively upgraded with designer furnishings, a state-of-the art entertainment center, HD flat-screen televisions in all rooms and a fully equipped gourmet kitchen and barbecue area, stocked and updated with the latest appliances. Enjoy private dining from the lanai while watching brilliant Big Island sunsets – and if you don't feel like cooking one night a chef service can easily be arranged for you to prepare personalized meals in your villa. Alternatively visit the Oceanfront Resident's Beach House, a favorite among homeowners and resort guests (try the "Big Daddy" Mai Tai and Garlic Fries) - a pleasurable 5-minute beachfront walk from your villa.Your luxurious master bedroom features a private, outdoor garden shower to complete your Hawaiian experience. The master bedroom features a king size bed, television and ceiling fan. Its gorgeous ensuite bathroom boasts a shower and bathtub as well as the private garden shower. The second bedroom is equipped with two twin beds and a television and is cooled by a ceiling fan.Take a leisurely stroll to many of the Resort's fine amenities: The Sports Club & Spa, Hualalai Golf Club or the beach at the Four Seasons. Choose from five swimming pools, several stores, four restaurants, and the local-style Trading Company and the Hualalai Coffee Company. The Club Concierge is on hand to help you with any bookings or arrangements. An additional swimming pool is conveniently located directly across from this villa - perfect for an end-of-day dip. Also available for your exclusive use is a 4-person golf cart. Take a spin through more than 800 acres of lush tropical landscaping surrounding fields of jet-black lava, or visit the Residents’ Beach House for lunch. This villa will leave you with lasting and fond memories of your Hualalai experience.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: W36216936-01

listing.listing_description: Reach the next level of comfort with this excellent group option at one of the Hawaii’s very finest hotels. Complete with a fantastic view of the Pacific, unparalleled access to the neighborhood’s famous beaches, close proximity to the shopping options of downtown Honolulu, plus a huge range of land and sea outings on your doorstep, this spacious suite is as welcoming as it is convenient.The Ritz Calton will be the kind of home-away-from-home that you will truly come to love, with a huge range of options and amenities waiting for guests. Begin the day with a workout in the fully-equipped gym, or take a dip in the blue brilliance of the rooftop pool, as the warm breeze blows in from Malama Bay. Next, take breakfast in the renowned Market restaurant, where local twists on classic dishes are served as morning light pours through the windows. Taste a delicious coffee in the expansive exterior concourse, and plan your next move as the sun sparkles on the sea in the distance. Indeed, the range of activities await those staying at the Ritz Carlton’s suites can be dizzying. Take a tour of the historic war memorials at Pearl Harbour, or dive beneath the waves with a scuba diving or sea scooter outing. Make your way to the southeast of the island to bath in the turquoise waters of Hanauma Bay, one of the most popular destinations in the entire island chain, or blast off for an amazing birds-eye view of the island with an exhilarating helicopter tour. With a packed day behind you, enjoy a cool drink on one of the many beachside bars at Waikiki Beach, or simply take in the fiery Pacific sunset from the air-conditioned comfort of your immaculately-furnished suite. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: GE/TA#137-233-3056-01

listing.listing_description: Measure your days by the sunlight filtering through the garden at Villa Condense. Set in the middle of lush, terraced rice fields outside Ubud, this amazingly quiet and private Bali vacation rental is truly an escape from it all. Invite up to eight friends and family members to share in the idyll at this four-bedroom retreat.Your holiday at Villa Condense includes the services of a cook, housekeeper, villa manager and pool attendant. Start the day with the included continental breakfast, then finish your coffee in the poolside bale before taking a swim or stretching out on a lounger. Break for afternoon tea or a treatment in the villa’s spa, then watch the sun set over the verdant surroundings from the al-fresco dining area and finish the evening with refreshments from the bar.Natural textures like a stone terrace and thatched roof make this luxury property feel like part of the landscape, while its open-plan, open-air living spaces let the tropical breezes inside. The great room is a grand yet comfortable space, with sleek living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen all under one vaulted ceiling.Villa Condense has three honeymoon-worthy bedrooms with king beds and a fourth bedroom with two twin beds; all four have en-suite bathrooms with al-fresco showers and bathtubs. Colorful accent pieces give the bedrooms personality, while four-poster beds lend a certain romance.A stay at Villa Condense is a different, more serene experience than a typical beach-oriented vacation to Bali. Spend your time simply unwinding at the villa, or make the 15-minute drive into Ubud to explore the town’s art galleries, museums, shops and restaurants. Of course, if you just can’t miss the beach, it’s only an hour’s drive to the popular resort area of Seminyak.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Melt your stress away and reconnect with nature at this tranquil Balinese villa in Kecamatan Mengwi. Book a morning yoga session in the garden or by the fish pond. Sip Nespresso in the shaded bale while you catch up on some reading. The private chef, part of a full-staff, will have breakfast ready to enjoy at the alfresco setting. Then, walk 5-minutes to Pererenan Beach and relax in the sand.Wander the properties communal layout and discover numerous spots for group gatherings, as well as smaller areas to escape for more intimate moments. At the center, a saltwater swimming pool is outlined by tropical gardens, lush lawns, and furnished outdoor spaces. Inside, an elegant white interior contrasts the vibrant hues of Bali’s natural elements. Sit for a game of chess in the living room. Book a massage in the stand-alone spa. Later, mix up some cocktails and hang out in the entertaining kitchen while the chef prepares dinner in the staff kitchen.After spending the morning on Pererenan Beach, check out some of the other pristine beach areas on Bali’s southern coast. If you’re feeling adventurous, sign-up for a surfing lesson on Seminyak Beach, where conditions are suitable for beginners all year. Continue along the coast to Tanah Lot, an ancient stone temple built on a rock formation in the sea. The view at sunset is fantastic. At night, check out Finn’s Recreation Club for Bali’s wildest nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take in a magnificent Victoria sunset from the shores of Lake Connewarre from this premium, lakeside mansion. Baroque style runs throughout this stately home, with broad, lake-facing windows and white pillars. Walk groomed pathways to the home’s sculpted garden. Graceful, bright interiors characterize the living areas, with golf, beaches, wine country and Geelong town nearby.The lengthy expanse of Campbell Point House’s driveway gives a hint to new arrivals of the level of style and elegance to expect. This property ensures that groups can occupy the wings that best suit them, with full equipped apartments in the main house, lake house, cottage and stables. The home features a level of intricate design and craftsmanship more common to centuries past, with the style of the living rooms, a sheltered terrace, and a formal dining area capable of comfortably seating dozens of guests. Overhead windows and broad hallways ensure a regal experience, with grand bedrooms to match. From the grounds of Campbell Point House, take in the natural beauty of the Lake Connewarre area as well as nearby sights and tastes. Wading birds and parrots dot the shoreline, with the golden sands and blue water of Ocean Grove Beach a short drive away. To the east, guests can visit the excellent bars, restaurants and cafes of Geelong, or cast off for a refreshing Port Phillip bay cruise. To the west, the Bellarine Penninsula’s many excellent wineries are well worth a visit, before returning to the villa for a delicious evening meal, provided each night.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Casa Evaliza is a stunning luxury villa on the island of Bali, just steps from Petitenget Beach near Seminyak. Nestled on 1,200 square meters of lush private estate, the villa offers a secluded hideaway within walking distance of some of Seminyak's finest restaurants, clubs, and cultural attractions. Ample alfresco living and dining areas, elegant interiors, outstanding staff and services, and four bedroom suites including a kid-friendly bunkroom provide ideal accommodations for families and destination wedding guests.The villa's garden terrace features a lush lawn and fourteen-meter swimming pool like a tropical lagoon beside the pavilions. Step into the sparkling water to swim laps or play with the children, dipping your heads under the cool waterfall. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, repair to the alfresco dining table for a delicious, home-cooked lunch in the dappled shade. Then savor cocktails in the cool and sumptuous lounge.Beautiful doors open into the villa's pavilions, allowing the entire home to breathe the garden-scented air. Buddhist-inspired artwork and décor, native wood accents, and a combination of contemporary and vintage furnishings infuse the spaces with a deep tranquility. The cavernous, open-plan great room with vaulted ceilings and open walls sets the scene for serene evenings together. Enjoy aperitifs in the lounge and gather around the beautiful wood dining table for fine feasts of Southeast Asian fare. At night, cuddle up with a favorite movie in the spacious media room.There are three bedrooms with queen beds as well as a kids' bunkroom. All four bedrooms feature ensuite bathrooms, TVs, safes, and air conditioning, providing dreamy private sanctuaries for guests of all ages. The master suite and the primary guest suite include deep soaking tubs in their ensuite bathrooms.Casa Evaliza offers an ideal balance of cloistered seclusion and convenient access to the finest elements of Seminyak. You're a nine-minute walk to Seminyak Square and an easy stroll to Petitenget Beach. Seminyak Beach is also within walking distance or a few minutes' drive, while Finn's Recreation Club is about five kilometers away. The villa is on the same road as the Club at Legian Suites Hotel and a short walk from the upscale KU DE TA restaurant.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Watch as sailboats navigate Tutukaka Harbour from the furnished balcony at this modern villa in northern New Zealand. Feel the cool sea breeze as you finish off your morning espresso. Then, head inside for a quick bite at the breakfast bar before heading out to explore New Zealand. A great place to snap a few pictures and work on your tan is Whale Bay Beach, named for its most famous visitors.Designed with the view in mind, Makoha Retreat’s floor-to-ceiling windows let you fully enjoy the harbour, especially in the unobstructed corner of the living room. An open-concept layout makes it easy to gather the group for dinner, casual hangouts, and even while someone is working away in the kitchen. After dinner, treat the group to a locally crafted bottle of wine in the terrace lounge.When the sun has set, get behind the wet bar and unleash your inner mixologist, turn up the sound system, or let the entertainer in your group show off on the piano. Later, when it cools off, move the party to the hot tub and melt any lingering stress away. In the morning, burn some of those calories off with the exercise equipment or take the kayak or stand-up paddleboard out for a spin.Feeling adventurous? It’s time to try scuba diving at the Poor Knights Islands. Forged by an ancient volcano, this series of islands is home to a vast array for sea creatures and corals, as well as the world’s largest sea cave, Rikoriko. Keep going to Sandy Bay and take a surfing lesson at one of the country’s most popular spots. If you’re not into surfing, the beach is perfect for picnics and horseback riding.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perfect for a couples retreat, family vacation, or honeymoon, this stylish two bedroom offers an incredible amount of privacy, despite its desirable location in the vibrant city of Sydney, Australia. The Woolloomooloo community is one of Sydney’s most desirable. With quick and easy access to the downtown core, Finger Wharf, the harbor district, and the beaches, Woolloomooloo is right where you’ll want to be. And, with its scenic rooftop balcony, you won’t have to go far to enjoy the amazing environment of Sydney.Sir John’s monochromatic interior, designer furnishings, and high-end electronics display an elegant sophistication that is perfect for any occasion. Floor-to-ceiling windows and openings to the terrace ensure that fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight flow freely throughout the entire villa, reminding you of the beauties beyond its walls. The master bedroom is outfitted with a king-sized bed and an en-suite with a rain shower and bathtub. The second bedroom comes with a king bed as well.If you’re thinking of hosting, Sir John has more than enough space for guests in its formal and alfresco dining areas. The fully equipped kitchen, and barbecue offer state of the art appliances, sure to inspire culinary creativity. After dinner, head up to the rooftop pavilion and lounge to enjoy your favorite cocktail under the stars. Back inside, you’ll appreciate the villas sound system, gas fireplace, air conditioning, washer/dryer, and Wi-Fi during your stay.First stop, visit the stars of Sydney’s world-famous skyline, the Sydney Opera House and the Harbor Bridge. A great place to enjoy the view, and a cocktail, is Taylor’s Rooftop bar, a favorite among locals and return visitors. If you’re in the mood to swim or work on your tan, Sydney Harbour National Park, Reef Beach, and Cobblers Beach are all great spots to lay your towel. And, for dinner, shopping, and nightlife, Sydney’s harbor district is always a bustling environment, and it’s just a few minutes from home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Retreat to the lesser-traveled side of a tropical paradise at Alta Vista Bali Mountain Villa. Hidden away on its own hilltop in north Bali, this incredible vacation rental delivers a holiday unlike anything else on the island. Even better, its five bedroom pavilions and full staff deliver resort-worthy luxury in the ambience of a private residence.Your stay at the villa includes the services of a chef, butler, property manager, housekeeper and round-the-clock security guard. Enjoy welcome refreshments and daily breakfast—and work it off with the help of the fitness and yoga instructors. If you’re keen to simply relax, take advantage of the heated infinity pool, hot tub, sun loungers and firepit. There’s also a barbecue, sound system and Wi-Fi.This one-of-a-kind property is spread out over more than an acre of beautifully landscaped grounds, with a living and dining pavilion at its center. Here, an open-concept, open-sided great room welcomes friends and family with a sitting area, dining table for twelve and a fully equipped kitchen.The villa has three bedrooms with king beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, furnished balconies, air conditioning and ceiling fans. And each bedroom is set in its own pavilion on the grounds, giving couples the honeymoon-style privacy of their own space.As its name suggests, Alta Vista Bali Mountain Villa commands sweeping views of the mountains all the way to the island’s north coast. Despite its lofty setting, however, it’s only a short drive to local attractions such as waterfalls, gardens, museums and temples. Tee off at the nearby course at Handara Golf and Resort Bali or plan a cultural excursion to the royal palace in Ubud. Wherever you go, you’ll be surrounded by the unspoiled landscape that truly makes this island magical.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spanish style goes down under at this rustic retreat in the hills outside Byron Bay. Furnishings inside and out were hand-crafted by local artisans, but inspired by the breezy sophistication of European summer homes—think simple lines and a mix of textures in fabrics and finishes. Surf’s up on the Byron Bay beaches, along with snorkeling and wind sports, less than 15 kilometers from the villa. Entertain friends and family outdoors on the villa’s timber decks, which feature shaded al-fresco living and dining areas, then break for a swim in the 15-meter pool. Not only is the outdoor table made from 200-year-old teak, the amphitheater-like firepit was crafted from rocks pulled from the rainforest on the property. There’s also an outdoor hot tub, trampoline, wood-fired barbecue, and pizza oven, as well as a TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi indoors. Enjoy the luxury of indoor-outdoor living Australia style in a brick-floored great room lined in slide-away glass walls. A sloping wood-paneled roof stretches over a sunken sitting area, a dining area with seating for 16, and a fully equipped kitchen with a generous breakfast bar. The five bedrooms at this vacation rental are spread out over the three-bedroom Homestead, one-bedroom Barn Studio, and one-bedroom Cabin Inn. The Homestead has one master suite with a king bed and two bedrooms with two twin beds each; all three have en-suite bathrooms. The Barn Studio bedroom has a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, plus a lounge area and private entrance that make it suitable for honeymoon-style holidays. The Cabin Inn has a queen bed and hall bathroom. Though the villa sits on 120 acres of rolling hills in Coopers Shoot, it’s also a short drive from the popular Byron Bay beaches. Take a long stroll or surf on Belongil Beach, parts of which are clothing-optional, or bring the kids for a swim at lifeguard-patrolled Main Beach. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This stunning villa is part of the world-class Hualalai Resort on Hawaii's Big Island. Situated at the entrance to Pakui Street, the villa is within walking distance of the beach at the Four Seasons, and enjoys easy access to the resort's championship golf course, spa, and other superb features. Gorgeous alfresco living spaces, sumptuous interiors, exquisite and naturalistic design, and three deluxe bedroom suites sleeping six provide a dream setting for families and groups of friends.Bordered by beautiful volcanic rocks and lush gardens, the villa enjoys breathtaking views of the golf course and Pacific Ocean. A shapely swimming pool and hot tub seem like lagoons in a dreamy tropical clearing, inviting you to savor enchanting hours in the exquisite light. Enjoy mornings on elegant sun loungers and afternoons sipping cocktails in the comfortably furnished lanai. Returning from the beach, cook a barbecue lunch and relish it alfresco at the ocean-view table, or enjoy quiet time in the garden with furnished patio.An open wall allows the villa's interior to breathe the ocean air. The open-concept living room, contiguous with the lanai and pool terrace, creates an expansive space for dining and entertainment. Watch the game or your favorite shows in the ample TV den, or sip pre-dinner refreshments in the adjoining cocktail lounge. Cook delicious feasts in the spacious and luminous kitchen, serving apps at the bar. When needed, repair to the office suite for work or study.The master suite features a private terrace, stunning ocean views, an alfresco shower, and a gorgeous king bed beneath peaked ceilings with exposed wood beams and ceiling fan. There is a guest room with king bed and one with two queens; both have ensuite bathrooms and alfresco showers as well, and the double queen room opens to the terrace.Beyond your private residence, the renowned Hualailai Resort is at your fingertips. Walk to the beach at the Four Seasons, play a game of championship golf, and indulge in the sports club and spa. You're also an easy drive to Mauna Lani Golf, Hapuna Beach, and Kailua-Kona. Kona International Airport is just eight miles away, making this a convenient vacation rental for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-006-286-7456-02.

listing.listing_description: Stay in a contemporary masterpiece less than a quarter-mile from famed Bondi Beach at Wallis St. Sleek, bright and beautifully designed, this incredible vacation rental makes a stylish setting for a beach getaway or a holiday spent exploring the must-sees of Sydney. Its four bedrooms mean you can invite a group of up to eight friends or family along.On sunny days, bring a book out to the private courtyard and relax in a lounger on the terrace or splash in the heated pool and hot tub. In the evenings, climb the stairs to the deck and heat up the barbecue for a meal at the alfresco table. Or unwind inside with the help of amenities from a home theater and wet bar to a games room with pool and foosball tables.Clean lines, neutral tones and an open-concept layout give the interiors of Wallis St a look of pared-down chic. Pale wood floors and matching wall panels link the sitting area to the adjacent fully equipped kitchen, where the dining area is built right into the stone countertops.This luxury property boasts a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed, ensuite bathroom, balcony and views of both ocean and city. There are also two bedrooms with queen beds and ensuite bathrooms, and one bedroom with a queen bed and shared bathroom. Like the rest of the house, the bedrooms have air conditioning and ceiling fans.But the villa’s best feature might just be its location: a 6-minute walk from Bondi Beach and less than a quarter-mile from the Bondi to Bronte walk, the North Bondi children’s pool and the Bondi golf course. Lie out on the white sand, swim on the gentler north end or walk to the south end of the beach to watch surfers fly along the waves.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Breezy days and balmy nights are yours to savor at Wamoro. This one-of-a-kind retreat on the tropical island of Sumba is part of the Nihi Sumba Resort, ranked number one in the world by Travel + Leisure in 2016. Use the four bedrooms for a relaxed family stay or an indulgent getaway with friends, or reserve this entire luxury vacation rental for a decadent honeymoon.Your holiday at Nihi Sumba includes butler service and three meals each day, which can be served privately in the villa. Though the resort has shared pools and lounges for your use, Wamoro also has its own infinity pool, ocean-view terrace with plenty of loungers, and al-fresco sitting and dining areas. Sip non-alcoholic refreshments from the complimentary minibar, and post favorite photos of your stay via Wi-Fi.Wamoro is tucked into lush gardens planted with fragrant jasmine, hibiscus and frangipani. The villa’s open-sided living areas let the floral scents waft in on the breeze, while a thatched roof overhead evokes traditional Indonesian architecture. Wicker sofas and natural-fiber rugs add organic warmth and texture, and work by local artisans further connects the villa to its surroundings.The four bedroom suites at Wamoro are retreats in their own right, with king beds, en-suite bathrooms, sitting areas and private balconies that look out over the ocean. Like the common living areas, the suites feature natural textures of wood and wicker alongside vibrant printed textiles that have long been a hallmark of Indonesian design.The villa is only a short walk from the private beach, restaurants, bars and boathouse at Nihiwatu—not to mention the resort’s chocolate factory. Test your balance at a surf lesson, follow a local guide on a horseback ride through the island landscape, book a “spa safari” to a breathtaking nearby valley, or ask the multilingual staff to recommend the perfect activity for you.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sleek modern style is rivaled only by dramatic ocean views at Denning St. Revel in the cool contemporary luxury of this four-bedroom Sydney vacation rental—and take advantage of its location in the Coogee area to visit nearby beaches and attractions on a holiday with up to twelve friends or family members.This beautifully designed residence sits amid private grounds with landscaped gardens, a heated pool, hot tub and plenty of loungers. Serve dinner from the barbecue at an al-fresco dining table for eight, then finish the evening with local wine on the rooftop terrace or a quiet night inside in front of the cable TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.A slide-away glass wall brings the ocean views into the villa’s open-concept great room. The clean, mod-inspired lines of the fully equipped kitchen and dining area are balanced by soft textures and a generous sectional in the sitting area. A separate TV lounge is tucked behind the kitchen, and there’s another sitting area that looks out onto the pool area.Denning St has two bedrooms with queen beds: one master suite with an en-suite bathroom, and one that shares access to a hall bathroom. There are also two children’s rooms, each with a double bed, that share access to a hall bathroom. Larger parties can make use of a twin trundle bed and a sofa bed as well.You can see the ocean from the villa, of course, but even better is getting into the water at one of the tidal pools. The nearest is tiny Ivor Rowe Rockpool, just a 5-minute walk from Denning St, but heritage-listed Wylie’s Baths is also well worth a visit. Spend a sunny day on relaxed, family-friendly Coogee Beach and a honeymoon-worthy evening with your sweetheart at one of the waterfront cafes. If you’d like to see more of the city, attractions like the Royal Botanic Gardens and the iconic Sydney Opera House are only a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ke Alaula is a beautiful villa in Kailua Kona on Hawaii's Big Island. Located within the Four Seasons Hualalai, this stunning vacation rental offers proximity to world-class resort amenities along with the exquisite privacy and comforts of a luxury home. With three bedrooms, spectacular ocean views, and superb indoor and outdoor spaces, Ke Alaula is ideal for family getaways, golfcations, and destination wedding guests.Surrounded by beautifully landscaped gardens and lawns, Ke Alaula's multiple patios and verandas boast expansive views of the Pacific Ocean and the Four Seasons golf course. Savor local Kona coffee in the lanai, relaxing on elegant loungers and gazing out on the gardens and sea. Fire up the grill for a delicious afternoon barbecue of local fare, and relish it at the alfresco table.From the lanai, expansive glass doors open to the stunning interior Great Room. Under vaulted ceilings, enjoy cocktails in the sumptuous lounge and watch your favorite movies on the 55-inch TV. Prepare meals in the fully equipped kitchen and enjoy them around the elegant dining table. The decor of the Great Room is superb, with wicker and wooden furnishings, woven lauhala ceilings, and a beautiful color palette that soothes the spirit and echoes the island's precious natural beauty.The main floor also includes one bedroom, with a king bed, access to the balcony, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower. At ground level, the deluxe master bedroom features a beautiful king bed, private lanai with lounge furniture, ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and large stand-alone tub, and alfresco shower. The ground-floor guest bedroom has a queen bed, shared access to the hall bathroom, and direct access to the terrace. This floor also features a media room with comfortable furniture, flat-screen TV, and wide doors to the outdoor garden and lanai, as well as a peaceful office space.Ke Alaula is wonderfully located for enjoying and exploring the Big Island. You're just a fifteen-minute walk from the Four Seasons Hualalai Beach, or a short ride in the complementary 4-seater golf cart. Hapuna Beach and Kahaluu Beach are an easy drive away. For golf, Mauni Lani and Mauna Kea are close by. At extra cost, enjoy the award-winning amenities of the Four Seasons resort.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-034-099-2000-03

listing.listing_description: This enchanting luxury residence is located within Nyaman Villas, an exclusive community of six private homes located within walking distance of Seminyak Square, in Southern Bali. Designed by renowned architect Stephan Remini, the villas combine traditional Balinese ambiance, high-end amenities, and a prime location within minutes of some of the island's finest beaches and nightlife. This four-bedroom gem is ideal for families or groups of friends up to eight in size, with 570 square meters of total living space, a large outdoor swimming pool, and beautiful living and dining areas. A private staff is on hand to elevate your experience, including security services, a butler, and a villa manager. Daily breakfast is provided, and chef services (among other deluxe offerings) are available.The villa's superb design blends interior and outdoor spaces into an airy, harmonious whole. A spacious, 75-square-meter living room greets you upon entry, along with a superb, American-style kitchen, fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and generous countertops made of hand-carved Balinese stone. The kitchen and living room open to a magnificent terrace and 92-square-meter swimming pool, set amid flowering trees and lush gardens. The pool extends beneath a shaded veranda opposite the living room, with a sumptuous daybed poised above the water.Two bedroom suites flank the pool and daybed, each featuring 25 square meters of living space, 10-square-meter dressing areas, and semi-open bathrooms with alfresco showers and tubs. The fabulous master suite, on the upper level, features a king bed, private furnished balcony, and ensuite bathroom with alfresco shower and tub. The fourth bedroom is located near the living room and kitchen, featuring two twin beds (or one queen) and an ensuite bathroom with alfresco shower.Nyaman Villas offers an exceptional alternative to the popular resorts around Seminyak, balancing exclusivity with convenience. Walk about five minutes to the city square, or drive five minutes to Seminyak Beach or Petitenget Beach. Ngurah Rai International Airport is only twelve kilometers away, and round-trip airport transfer is included in your vacation rental—making it an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: _ This property has recently undergone minor remodelling. The images you are viewing may differ from the furnishings and décor of the property. _This spectacular four-bedroom villa is situated in the Mosman suburb of Syndey, a short walk from Balmoral Beach and minutes from downtown. Designed by the renowned architecture firm PopovBass, the villa enjoys expansive views of the bay from all three levels and ample outdoor living areas for savoring the Pacific light. High-end amenities include a steam room, gym, elevator, underfloor heating, home automation, and chef-grade appliances. Four bedrooms provide excellent accommodations for families and friends seeking stylish waterfront serenity and a prime location.The villa's exquisite design gracefully fuses alfresco living spaces with luminous interiors. A ground-floor media room opens to a swimming pool lined with elegant loungers, inviting you to refreshing dips and tranquil relaxation under the sun or stars. Climb the exterior stairs to the main living areas on the middle floor, where vanishing walls create a seamless, open-concept space. The designer kitchen serves a breakfast bar and two dining tables, while two ample lounges set the scene for wine parties with loved-ones. The minimalist décor accentuates the natural light and beauty of the bay and coast, enhanced by choice touches of cheerful color, rustic texture, and sea-inspired forms.All four bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms, and three enjoy views of the bay. The master suite opens to a balcony and features a king bed, a walk-in closet, and a soaking tub in its bathroom, while the three guest rooms all feature double beds.From the villa, you're an easy walk to Balmoral Beach and less than two kilometers from Mosman Village. Guests of all ages will fine exciting activities within minutes of your door, including Taronga Zoo, the Royal Botanic Gardens, and Sydney Opera House. With Sydney Airport about seventeen kilometers away, this vacation rental is a convenient base for destination wedding guests seeking maximum privacy and style during their stay.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set only steps away from the beach, Sea Spirit 811 is your own piece of paradise. This newly built contemporary vacation rental is just a short walk from Mokapu Beach on the grounds of the Andaz Maui at Wailea Resort and has panoramic ocean views. The fantastic location, luxury resort amenities and a range of activities make this villa the perfect choice for a family holiday, tropical getaway with friends or even a decadent honeymoon.Guests of Sea Spirit 811 have charging privileges at the resort and are welcome to use the shared pools, hot tub, lounge areas and fitness center. Book a treatment at the spa or reserve one of the cabanas. The villa also opens to its own private lanai with a hot tub, barbecue, and lounging and dining areas overlooking the ocean—an ideal spot for watching sunsets over the Pacific.The villa is laid out around an open-concept great room with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen. Floor-to-ceiling windows and sliding glass doors leading to the lanai showcase the views of palm trees and brilliant blue water, while sleek furniture in neutral tones creates an understated modern look. A pantry just off the kitchen stocked with state-of-the-art appliances and treats like local coffees makes meal prep a pleasure.Each of the three bedrooms at Sea Spirit 811 has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and a TV equipped with Netflix. There are two rooms with garden views: one with one queen bed and one with two queen beds. The third bedroom is a master suite with a king bed and ocean views that opens directly to the balcony.The Andaz Maui at Wailea offers everything from water sports and family-friendly fun to insights into Hawaiian culture, such as guided kayak tours, stand-up paddleboard excursions, a video-game room, and ukulele and hula lessons. You can even ask to borrow a GoPro or arrange a session with a professional photographer for mementoes of your trip that you’ll treasure forever. There’s more than enough to keep you busy at the resort, but if you’d like to explore further, it’s a 15-minute walk or less from the villa to Ulua Beach, the Wailea Old Blue golf course and The Shops at Wailea.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. listing.listing_description: World-class wine and incredible architecture await at this breezy smart home on the Elephant Hill Vineyards in New Zealand. Spend your mornings sipping Nespresso while you sit amongst lush gardens. In the afternoon, cool off in the swimming pool while you gaze upon views of the rolling hillside. After you’ve tasted the cuisine at the Elephant Hill’s restaurant, head 14km to check out Hastings.Designed to merge indoor and outdoor spaces, this U-shaped lodge features multiple floor-to-ceiling openings in nearly every room. From the minimalistic, yet super-spacious kitchen, to the dining room, and onto to the courtyard, your dinner parties will flow as freely as the breeze. Pick the perfect pairing from the wine cellar, turn up the sound system, and see where the night takes you.For lunch, gather the group at the alfresco set for a backyard barbecue. After, see if there’s any rugby on the satellite or stretch out in the library with a good book. The villa comes with Wi-Fi and an office space if you are keeping up with work. And, there’s are a variety of add-ons available including fitness classes, excursions, and private chef services. The lodge comes with garage parking for 1, and there are 5 more spaces in the driveway.Rebuilt after a devasting earthquake in 1931, the city of Napier rebuilt in eye-popping Art Deco fashion. See the sites from the back of a vintage car with Napier Classic Car’s architecture tour or go for a walk with Art Deco Trust. After a tour of the city, take a self-guided-audio-handset tour through the old cells and creepy corridors of the country’s oldest correctional facility, Napier Prison.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: An oasis of peace and tranquility in the rural village of Berawa, Dea Villas Estate comprises four luxury villas nestled within lush tropical gardens, which can be rented separately or together, thus providing the perfect setting for a couple on a honeymoon, multiple families holidaying together, or for a wedding celebration.Each villa is set in its own private garden with swimming pool, sundeck and lotus ponds, offering up to forty residential guests absolute privacy, along with the calming feeling of being one with nature. Guests can also enjoy shared access to an on-site gym, a spa with massage beds, a traditional sauna, and a children’s playground featuring swings, slides, sandpit and a playhouse. A 24-hour butler service ensures that guests are looked after in complete discretion, and private chefs take care of the daily cooking. At Dea Villas Estate, everything has been designed for a luxurious relaxing experience.From traditional to contemporary, each villa has its own character and features beautiful interiors with elegant furniture and artefacts from Southeast Asia, China and Taiwan. All boast hi-tech facilities, such as iPod docks and home theatre systems, granting guests supreme comfort.One of the villas – four-bedroom Saraswati is built on two floors with a contemporary feel. Perfect for families, it is made up of a large open-plan pavilion and a two-storey residence designed around a swimming pool, with soothing views across rice terraces. In the pavilions, a formal seating area and dining area complete with a bar counter and kitchens, serve as a gathering place for all guests. The two-storey residence, which is flanked by a covered terrace, features two master suites on the ground floor, and two suites with home theaters on the second floor.Drawing inspiration from Indonesia’s architectural tradition, three-bedroom Amy and four-bedroom Sati provide accommodation across several individual pavilions. Welcoming guests with a traditional Balinese entrance, Villa Amy consists of three pavilions separated by pools and ornamental ponds, and connected by a covered walkway. One open-sided pavilion contains a living area, another is a stand-alone bedroom suite, and the third one comprises a master suite and twin bed suite. Similarly, Villa Sati has an open-sided living pavilion, which looks over an amphitheater-style space, designed for traditional Balinese dance performances. The bedrooms are located in four pavilions surrounding the pool – each with a wonderful garden bathroom and sun terrace. An antique lumbung – a traditional rice barn – completes the picture.The smallest villa – one-bedroom Radha - is a century-old teakwood pavilion raised on stilts above a lily pond. Perfect for a honeymoon or a romantic couple getaway, it features a bedroom with king size bed and adjoining dressing area, a large verandah with seating and a tropical garden bathroom. Across the pond is a smaller pavilion, which serves as a reading or breakfast room, and a pool awaits at the end of the garden.Situated five minutes from Berawa Beach - one of the best surf spots in Bali - and only fifteen minutes from the boutiques and vibrant bars of Seminyak, this exclusive enclave enjoys an enviable location, allowing guests to explore the stunning landscapes of Bali, either on the villa bikes, or with the complimentary car and driver.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Overlooking the unending Indian Ocean and with the eternal Mount Batukaru in the backdrop, Soori - Six Bedroom Residence is a dream vacation villa in Bali. Much like the legendary Indonesian island itself, Soori Residence is highly artful both in its sleek architecture and stylish decor that effortlessly melds with the tropical gardens of the estate. The villa’s five lavish suites accommodate groups up to ten, each of whom will be captivated by the estate’s private and privileged beachfront.Soori - Six Bedroom Residence has countless amenities, everything a traveling guest would want to have while on their tropical dream vacation. The zero-edge swimming pool produces a great optical effect of seemingly merging with the ocean and is conveniently located next to the inviting alfresco dining area, grill and wet bar which are all just screaming for a party. Indoors, guests are encouraged to take full advantage of the cutting-edge Apple TV and Bose sound system. An appointed butler, housekeeper and 24-hour room service will keep guests happy as proverbial clams.The villa’s open air pavilions and decor not only compliment each other, but also the lush tropical gardens. The rooms feature designer light fixtures and a largely black-and-white color scheme with splashes of eye-grabbing ochre and chestnut brown. The interior dining space features a long and elegant rustic table, next to the gourmet kitchen.Three of home’s five en-suite bedrooms have been equipped with plush king size beds, while the remaining two rooms have two comfortable twin size beds. Each room also has a sound system hooked up to iPod docks and balconies with dazzling ocean views. Additionally, the master suite boasts an alluring terrazzo bath tub and a large walk-in closet.Soori - Six Bedroom Residence is only a five minute drive from Pan Pacific Resort, offering excellent tennis and golf facilities. Other encouraged activities include a climb up Mount Batukaru, which should be reserved for experienced hikers, through the island’s largest wetland rainforest. Sangeh Monkey Forest should also be on everyone’s list, not just for a chance to see the monkeys, but also to see the 17th century Bukit Sari Temple. Experience peace of mind and tropical bliss like never before with Luxury Retreats in Bali!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Celebrate an unforgettable wedding or reunion at this lush, private oasis in southern Bali. Minutes from Omnia and Glass House by Tirtha Bridal, the secluded villa boasts expansive entertainment areas, a cavernous dining pavilion, and 5 king bedroom suites. Luminous interiors and verandas balance modern style with traditional Indonesian artistry. Karma Beach on the Indian Ocean is minutes away.Cloistered amid high walls, the estate forms an ideal venue for festive receptions or carefree relaxation. Thick-cushioned sun loungers and wood-stemmed parasols accompany the large infinity swimming pool, while the lawn offers ample room for ceremonies, cocktail parties, or games with the kids. A sloping thatched ceiling extends from the lower veranda, creating a semi-alfresco dining pavilion for special feasts.Two staircases ascend from the lawn to the veranda, while multiple sets of doors create a graceful flow indoors. On this lower level, the open-concept space features a comfortable lounge overlooking the yard and a large desk that can service as an office space. Another large lounge is located upstairs, with beautiful, low-slung sofas and wide doors opening to a shaded balcony. The breezy and luminous kitchen features chef-grade appliances, a breakfast bar, and a lovely table perched by a wide arched opening. The vacation rental includes butler services, security, and daily housekeeping.All 5 bedrooms feature king beds, air conditioning, balconies, and ensuite bathrooms. One of the bedrooms includes an additional twin-size bed, forming a family suite. Modern furnishings harmonize with natural wood accents and superb contemporary artwork, evoking the unique spirit of present-day Bali.Beyond your private haven, you're just 9 minutes from Karma Beach, less than 6 kilometers from New Kuta Golf Course, and short drive from Uluwatu Temple. Ngurah Rai International Airport is only 16 kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb villa is situated within Champion Ridge, a gated golf community at Mauna Lani Resort on Hawaii's Big Island. With breathtaking views of the golf course and Kohala Mountains, the 4,000-square-foot home balances rustic Hawaiian elegance with outstanding amenities, including a private swimming pool and hot tub, alfresco dining, a gourmet kitchen, and excellent media features. Four ample bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms—three with king beds, one with a pair of queens—accommodate families and groups of friends up to eight in size.The ample estate forms an enchanting sanctuary amid the lush, seaside paradise of Mauna Lani. Sunbathe on lounge chairs overlooking the sublime vista, and plunge into the infinity pool. Fire up the barbecue in the afternoon, and gather for meals at the long table on the side patio, set amid verdant gardens and beautiful lava-rock walls. Savor a hot tub soak in the evening light, and celebrate with each other under the starry Pacific sky.The interiors offer a soothing retreat for afternoon downtime or festive nights, with wide doors opening to the lanai and pool. The airy space features a comfortable TV lounge, a dining table for ten, and a kitchen with chef-grade appliances and breakfast bar. There is also a separate media room. Exquisite wood surfaces and artisanal details evoke a quintessential Hawaiian ambiance, in harmony with the vibrant natural landscape enveloping you.The bedroom suites are arranged around an inner courtyard patio with fountain—the home's tranquil heart. Ensuite bathrooms and private patios create a generous setting for large groups, ideal for families or destination wedding guests. The master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and deluxe bathroom with jetted tub, interior shower, and alfresco shower. There is also a quiet office space off the master suite.Mauna Lani Beach Club is minutes away, featuring a swimming pool, hot tub, clubhouse, and watersports equipment. The world-class spa and fitness facilities at Mauna Lani Resort are also within easy reach, and you're less than a mile from championship golf at Francis H. I'i Brown South Course. The 23.5-acre Champion Ridge community features its own gardens and Hawaii's only 18-hole putting course, with 350 yards of rolling greens.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved. listing.listing_description: See what laid-back luxury can be at the gorgeous White Hawk Retreat. Filled with Scandi-chic pieces and thoughtful touches, this eight-bedroom Byron Bay vacation rental makes an inviting getaway for up to sixteen friends or family members. And though it feels like a private retreat, the 2-minute walk to Belongil Beach and 2-minute drive to Byron Bay put you close to the action.Step through the gates of this exclusive property and into outdoor living areas with a mineral swimming pool, lounging and dining furniture, a barbecue, exercise equipment and even a yoga space. You can also take the provided bicycles out for a spin around town. In the evenings, enjoy streaming TV in the media room, put a favorite playlist on the Sonos sound system or catch up via Wi-Fi.The villa’s minimalist lines, polished concrete floors and crisp white walls evoke the best of Scandinavian design, while a mix of furnishings brings a little French country flair and mid-century style to this beach town. The retreat is laid out around an L-shaped open-concept great room with a living area, dining area and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.There are four bedrooms in the villa’s main house and four in its studios; all eight have queen beds and en-suite bathrooms. The main-house bedrooms are comfortable and stylish, and the studio bedrooms are perfect for couples seeking honeymoon-style privacy while on holiday, with features like private courtyards and al-fresco showers.White Hawk Retreat is a 2-minute walk from Belongil Beach and less than a 10-minute drive from Byron Main, Tallow and Wategos beaches, making it easy to get your fill of sun and sand. It’s also a 2-minute drive to shopping and dining in downtown Byron Bay, and a 10-minute drive to Cape Byron Lighthouse and the easternmost point in Australia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Check in to the hills above Byron Bay at Picadilly House. This European-inspired vacation rental is a private escape in Coopers Shoot, with views over a valley to the Pacific and a location just a few minutes’ drive from some of Australia’s most famous beaches. Six bedrooms in two spacious wings can accommodate parties of friends or extended family.Take in the panoramic views from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. For lazy afternoons, there’s a hammock; for cooler evenings, there’s a firepit. Kids will love playing in the treehouse, too. After sunset, an Apple TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi, pool table and indoor bar area are ready to entertain.Inspired by traditional architecture and craftsmanship, Picadilly House is laid out across two wings and built using recycled timber and Spanish plaster. The heart of this luxury residence is in the main wing, which features a living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen, all under lofty ceilings. The guest wing is made for entertaining and houses the bar and pool table.The villa has one bedroom with a king bed and ensuite bathroom, two bedrooms with a king and queen bed, respectively, that share a bathroom, and two bedrooms with queen beds that share a bathroom. There’s also a bedroom with a queen bed and access to its own hall bathroom. Larger parties can make use of a bunk room with two twin-over-double bunk beds and a hall bathroom, and even an Airstream trailer offering a double bed and honeymoon-style privacy.Picadilly House is a wonderful choice if you want just a little more than a beach holiday. While it’s only a 10-minute drive from Broken Head Beach and a quick trip to two other beaches in the Byron Bay area, it’s also close to the Broken Head Nature Reserve, the Cape Byron Lighthouse, the Teven Valley Golf Course and the laid-back vibes in downtown Byron Bay.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
